title: (20720) Azkoitia -

title: (20720) - 113 Lugar Barrio Madariaga

Really uneven. Only 1 night per 15 days. Maximum camper 5.50 m long. Please take the length seriously - you are endangering yourself and others (especially in high season and when maneuvering in the dark at night!)

description: Nice place to rest and spend time, summertime shadowy, there is a bar closed to where you can provide.

title: (20750) Zumaia -

title: (20829) Deba - 24W Itsaspe Auzoa
description: Parking where the path to visit the Flisch begins. parking that authorizes overnight stays but to take into account the following limitations: - only ONE night is allowed (every 15 days) - it is forbidden to remove awnings and chairs - park correctly using only one space. ATTENTION! keep the area clean! The car park DOES NOT HAVE SERVICES, but they are about 100 meters walking along the path at the end, where the toilets and picnic tables are. Drinking water tap (only for bottles), garbage cans. The arrival at the car park is along an asphalt road, the important thing to keep in mind is that the road has a LOT of SLOPE. From there you can start the path to the views of the coast, the flysch, and take a dip in the sea. quiet night, with one of the most starry skies!

title: (20750) Zumaia - 15 Basusta Bidea
description: Good parking under the entrance to the Camping. We spent the night, being a weekend we have had no problems.

Parking reserved for residents from May 1st to September 30th.
One of the few free parking spots in Deba, right next to the beach. No height limit. Cold showers and toilets at the main beach car park (9am to 8pm). Hot showers at the "surf club" Overall very good location, 5 mins walk to city center, close to hiking trails and a nice beach. Very crowded on hot summer days.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 901 Asti Auzoa
description: Parking of a football stadium. At the foot of the 4 lanes. A 30 minute walk to the beach of Zarautz (10 minutes by bike). Picnic area near the parking. The police let us parked for lack of a campsite (all full).

title: (20800) Zarautz - 630 Asti Auzoa
description: Parking under the AP-8 to one side of the football field. the only drawback is the noise from the cars passing over the bridge

title: (20820) Deba - N-634
description: Parking with panoramic view.

title: (20820) Deba - 1A Nafarroa Plaza
description: Deba beach parking. 5 min from the old town. Perfect views to see a good sunrise. Parking regulation (OTA): Month of May: Every Saturday, Sunday and holidays from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m. /// Summer: (from June 1 to September 15) Every day of the week from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m. /// Minimum time of stay 30 min, maximum 5 h.

title: (20570) Bergara - 13 Goiauzoa
description: San Martzial. Place with a hermitage, with drinking water fountains, picnic tables and a playground. Shading.

title: (20808) Getaria - 22 Portua Kalea
description: A standing room with a direct sea view. A little louder during the day, but it calms down at night so that you can sleep comfortably. In 400 meters you will find a very clean and quiet beach with beach showers and toilets, as well as the city center.

title: (20808) Guetaria - Agerre-Goikoa Baserria
description: Parking overlooking the beach and the port, at the entrance of Getaria arriving from Zarautz. Height limited to 1.90m. Tap on the beach (foot wash), as well as toilets and showers (I do not know what are the opening times). Close to restaurants and grocery stores (5min walk). Free parking from 8pm to 10am. Arrival at 21h and distributed early aprem the next day. I spent a very quiet night, far from the crowd of Zarautz, in my expert Peugeot. Some walkers / runners who spend the morning and evening and some people on the beach.

title: (20820) Deba - 16 Artzabal Auzoa
description: Quiet corner between football stadium and river '' wild '' location behind the football stadium of Beda. Possibility of this parked for one night. Very calm. Some walker in the morning with their dogs. Road and railway to be rated but very little disturbing.

title: (20820) Deba - N-634
description: Parking by the road with a view of the sea.

title: (20808) Getaria - 12 Aldamar Kalea
description: Parking next to the Red Cross. you need to enter from the back of the town to avoid the 1.9m height restriction but it's no problem to arrive. right on the beach, with no problems. no servies. but great peacadaria.

title: (20808) Getaria - 23 San Prudentzio Auzoa Auzoa
description: Small seaside car park, for day parking

title: (20808) Getaria - 13W Askizu Auzoa
description: Accessible motorhome between Getari and Zumaia by going on Zumaia on the left magnificent view, 5/6 places until when? ... Because already some present waste, stable ground

title: (20808) -
description: Roadside with great views of zamaia and the ocean. little traffic but recommended earplugs

title: (20808) Getaria - 26 Portua Kalea
description: Limit to 1.90m high. Ten places on the quay, quiet, close to the center of this big village. Access direction Port, right when we go to Bilbao

title: (20808) Getaria - N-634
description: A0 a night without problems.

title: (20570) Bergara - 2-4 Telleria Kalea
description: Área para Autocaravanas-marked area on hard ground between a work road and a stream in the Labegaraieta industrial park, south of the centre. No shade and not always quiet during the day. Simple VE option with floor inlet at the ramp. Accessible across the river via a bridge. There is a playground with climbing frames, scate track, water fountain and descent to the river. Be careful with children on the parking side, very high steep river. Sign with points of interest and route is in the parking lot. With a payment of € 5 you can therefore get services such as a discount at a spa and on bus tickets.

name: Camping Talai-mendi
title: (20800) Camping Talai-mendi
description: Camping Talai-mendi! Created in terraces, overlooking the sea, a few places for large campers, young audiences and many surfers with VW Bullis

title: (20216) Ormaiztegi - 27-31 San Andres Kalea
description: Parking without services. Very quiet for night and day. In front of the Zumalakarregi Museum.

title: (20810) Laurgain - 19Y Vial Camino Laurgain
description:
Parking 4 places for the night. seen on the river, but close to a busy road. relatively quiet night (just a dog barking all night)
good for a stopover

title: (20800) Zarautz - 3 Talaimendi Auzoa
description: On the Mirador de Zarautz, on the edge of the road behind the garbage containers, place for at least 5 vans or cars with a view of the sea,

title: (20809) Aia - 1 Ubegun Industrigunea
description: Day/night parking exactly on the opposite of the cheapest gas station in the area. Not romantic but ok go an overnight stay.

title: (20200) Beasain - 1 Igartza Oleta Kalea
description: Motorhome friendly Shops just in the front building. Bar Akelarre (Nice txorizo tapas) Zuhaizpe bar(opening 6 AM) nice breakfast, lunch/dinner for less than a fiver. Saltsamendi butcher is famous for their blood sausage. Free Wifi (akelarre bar)Service area with tokens to be taken from local merchants

title: (20200) Beasain - 47 Nafarroa Etorbidea
description: Nice and clean laundry open from 8:00-22:00. There are 2 machines of 10kg and 2 of 20kg and 2 dryers

title: (20809) Aia - 1 Arratola Aldea Auzoa
description: Parking under train station right next to the bridge that leads to the bar area. Suitable for vans. Public bath in the same street. Gratuitous.

name: Gran Camping Zarautz
title: (20800) Gran Camping Zarautz
description: It's on a hill = great views of the coast and Zarautz! Very clean toilets and showers. easy reservation, great extension. 15 minutes from the beach (down 439 steps / 100 meters in altitude) with a wonderful view of the pretty town with a beautiful promenade. The terrain slopes gently far into the sea and is therefore ideal for children!

title: (20810) Orio - 12 Ibai-Ondo Ibilbidea
description: Self-service laundry

title: (20810) Orio - 16 Baxoalde Kalea
description: Large public car park next to the estuary promenade, a playground and an Eroski. Spacious with many seats and several vans sleeping. We spent a quiet night from Saturday to Sunday. Public toilets on one side

title: (20830) Mutriku - GI-638
description: Small parking in the Mutriku viewpoint. The motorhomes have complicated to park because it must be done in battery and there is little space. At the entrance to the car park there is a sign that prohibits "camping".

title: (20400) Tolosa - 30 San Esteban Auzoa
description: Motorhome area just minutes from the historic center of the municipality. With a rich historical and cultural heritage, Tolosa is well known for its cuisine and typical local products. To find motorhome Aire pass the two carparks into industrial area. You will find services on left and parking on right.

title: (20400) Tolosa - 15C Iurramendi Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Parking without services, not exclusive for motorhomes. Located in quiet neighborhood residential area near the Camino de Santiago. Few places, there are mostly cars

title: (20200) Beasain - 2B A-1
description: Repsol service station, draining gray and black water, filled with drinking water. If you refuel it is free, otherwise the service costs. Totally recommended.

title: (20400) Tolosa - 23B Lugar Barrio San Esteban
description: Municipal motorhome area near the center without shade.

title: (20159) - 909 Lugar Zizurkil Nucleo
description: Parking at the entrance of Zizurkil Arriba. Very quiet, next to a church and the road. Few noises at night, cars do not usually pass, except at rush hour when there is a bit more hustle and bustle. Have we ever seen motorhomes stay overnight as well. Good views.

title: (20200) Beasain - Carretera Nacional
description:
Exit direction France: exit at the indication of the gas station and just past this there is a road that crosses the road below on the other side. exit in direction Madrid: exit 419 in the totonda 3rd exit and 20 meters on the left pass under the railway bridge.
There is a small blue area in the parking lot, but most of it is a free zone.
This is the parking lot of the ambulatory or health center. 2 minutes walk is the center of the town with pintxos bars and the entire commercial area. 200 meters away at the gas station there is the other point for emptying water.

title: (20240) Ordizia - 11 San Bartolome Kalea
description: Parking next to the Eroski supermarket and gas station. No loading or unloading services very close to the town with a beautiful old town. On Wednesdays there is a market that has been held for 500 years

title: (20269) Orendain - Egileor Aldea
description: Ibiur reservoir dam, very close to the a1, beautiful road around the reservoir, ideal for spending the night on the road. Access by road to baliarrain. Do not go under the dam following the gps.

title: (20810) Orio - 901 Etorbidea Aita Lertxundi
description: Unlimited public parking, in front of the river, public bathrooms leaving the parking lot towards the river promenade next to the exercise machine park.

title: (20810) Orio - Barreiatua
description: Large unpaved parking, isolated and quiet. A walk takes you to the marina and the lighthouse. Very nice and quaint. The beach is closed, it is not accessible .. glass box.

title: (20810) Orio - 13 Estropalari Kalea
description: Parking under highway bridge a bit noisy but perfect for spending the night. From 8:00 p.m. free. Beautiful to visit the surroundings, parks for children.

title: (20259) Baliarrain - 1 Herriz Gora Aldea
description: Quiet place, with water, tables, barbecue, swings. routes and spectacular views

title: (20600) Eibar - 9 Polonia Etxeberria Kalea
description: Free parking outside, quiet to sleep in van.

title: (20400) Tolosa - 910 Usabal Auzoa
description: Free parking Sports area Usabai. removed from the center of Tolosa, close to the N 1. noisy due to the passage of vehicles of the National

title: (20810) Orio - 39 Abaromendi Kalea
description: The parking space of the mobile home is payable. Paying to park under a road bridge, located at a roundabout, quite noisy. The view of the nearby marina and proximity to the beach make up for that, so overall ok. The services are free - many thanks to the municipality for that.

title: (20830) Mutriku - 11 GI-638
description: Car park on the cliff. Noisey road . Great view. Walk down to quiet stoney beach. Even has a cold shower.

title: (20810) Orio - Barreiatua
description:
Along a small quiet road and the river.

/!\ Saw a police car during the day who told us not to spend the night there.

title: (20830) Mutriku - 18 Olatz Auzoa
description: Small (gravel) parking next to the church of Olatz and taberna Zelaieta. Walks start from here. On the other side of the church there is a tap with a push button and there are garbage cans. The tavern is open in the morning until 2 pm and you can eat here for little money. There is a road to a river and there you can also climb a wall. The place is very clean, respect nature and keep it that way.

title: (20240) Ordizia - 1 Oiangurenaldea
description: Oiangu Park and picnic area. public baths and in txiringito versno

title: (20830) Mutriku - 11B Diseminado Mutriku Barreiatua
description: New free parking area, created due to the new road layout. Beautiful views of the coast and the cove of Alcolea. No noise from cars.

title: (20600) Eibar - 911 Via Arrate
description: Small park with parking for about 20 vehicles, picnic area with tables and a fountain. On the outskirts of Eíbar.

title: (20400) Usabal - 109 Usabal Auzoa Auzoa
description: Industrial area parking, fairly supervised, a little noisy but a stone's throw from the San Ignacio workshop for caravans

title: (20830) Mutriku - 11B Diseminado Mutriku Barreiatua
description: Splendid

title: (20810) Orio - 44 Abaromendi Kalea
description: Municipal parkplace with dedicated places for camping-cars. Good access to the beach, restaurant nearby.

title: (20810) Orio - 913 Calle Antilla
description: Beach parking, blue zone but on an esplanade where it is quiet and two minutes walk from the beach there is a bar with a very good atmosphere. The cool cool. Next to a park of ducks and roosters. Of course, you can hear the rooster sing

title: (20810) Orio -
description:
Very quiet place and spectacular location
Along the way there are areas where you can park well

title: (20830) Mutriku - 12 Calle Mutriku
description: At the foot of the road. parking with few places for vehicles. we only stop to eat

name: Orio Kanpina
title: (20810) Orio Kanpina
description:
Small campsite with swimming pool. Sea at 200 meters. Super equipped, very clean with all the comfort and necessary possible including mini-market and restaurant! acsi card accepted. friendly staff and near the village on foot 10 mins.

discount card is not accepted in july and august

title: (20830) - 33W Lugar Laranga
description: Parking without service to spend a night

title: (20270) Irura - 5 Zillar Kalea
description: Next to the motorway, perfect for a night when you are travelling. Nice for water change. There is a family oriented bar/restaurant first floor where you can have lunch/dinner. Free Wifi in the bar. Park for children and traditional basque pelota (trinquete) matches can be seen from the restaurant. Motorhome friendly owner.

name: SpeedQueen Lavandería
title: (20600) SpeedQueen Lavandería
description: Automatic laundry

title: (20810) Orio - Lugar Ortzaika Aldea, 901
description: 10 dedicated motorhome spaces provided by council in small car park just of main road. No black or grey dump but steps down to River and a drinking water fountain. Very handy base to walk or cycle along pretty river path to Orio town or on further to beach.  2 night max stay. Restaurant and waste bins opposite.

title: (20600) Eibar - 6W Lugar Mandiola Balle
description: Picnic area with several tables and fountain. Very quiet and shaded place. Plain and good way to arrive. From here you can make several excursions, for example to Mount Kalamua, from where there are spectacular views.

title: (20212) Olaberria - 6 Gainera Auzoa
description: Quiet recreational area next to residential area. It has several benches with tables, a fountain and a wastebasket. Please respect the environment and collect your rubbish. Leave the place better than you found it.

title: (20810) Orio - 6 Antilla Kalea
description: Park and stay overnight in quiet cul-de-sac. Only 100m to the sea and sandy beach. We were there during the Pentecost holidays. Almost empty beach. Cold shower on the beach. Toilets open on the beach in high season. Bar / coffee 50m on the beach. Free parking between 8pm and 8am. Otherwise parking fee - is checked regularly. Parking spaces are about car length. VW T4 with rear box is almost too long.
